int find_sum ( int lines , int i , int j ) { int sum = 0 ; int max_sum = 0 ; if ( i < lines && j <= i ) { max_sum = find_sum ( lines , i + 1 , j ) ; sum = find_sum ( lines , i + 1 , j + 1 ) ; if ( max_sum < sum ) max_sum = sum ; max_sum += matrix [ i ] [ j ] ; } return max_sum ; }
